title.name: name
title.term-2: Personal Information Collection and Use Agreement

caption.ID-card: Please upload a file of 20 MB or less.
caption.email-2: Mail verification requests can be made up to five times per day.
caption.email-3: The verification email has been sent.
caption.pass-1: More than 8 but less than 15 characters, including ’alphanumeric + special characters’
caption.name-1: Please enter in Korean or English.
caption.name-2: A valid name for the form.
caption.nickname-1: Korean/English/numeric 2 or more but less than 10 characters
caption.studentId-1: Please enter your full student ID number.
caption.studentCard-2: Please attach a photo of your physical (mobile) student ID with your school, department, class number, and full name.
caption.studentCard-3: This will not be used for any other purpose other than to verify your college student status.
